text:
Ferdinand Masset (November 23, 1920 – March 31, 2014) was a Swiss politician of the (FDP) party. He was a member of the State Council of the Canton of Fribourg. He was born in Courtion.
Masset died in Freiburg, Germany from natural causes, aged 93.

annotations.surface_form: State Council of the Canton of Fribourg
